Text:
Thanks for the 1080p at DVD size. Exactly what I was looking for. 

DD at 640kpbs is great too.

thanks murdoc for the description. I was about to write comment that I have downloaded 3-4 full hd rips but all are having same issue/release that some frames are full hd and some frames are not, so was wondering if it is all from one source only or rest every BD source have same problem.

+ 1 here we go again :) murdoc is back! first of all thank u very much for the Godfather trilogy and star wars franchise.
hey murdoc i've got one req don't whether u accept reqs or not but can do the LOTR trilogy 1080p extd versions in ur style DVD size either 384/640 audio pls.. I need them badly. sry to put pressure
- regards

i'm sorry phenom, i consider requests, i don't want to be the bad guy here, but i don't like the lotr trilogy. it would be a great deal for me to get the whole thing on BD (about 120gigs), and rip each one (takes a lot of time for 1080p!), just for me to delete them after... if it's any consolation, the extended versions are a bit too long to rip them in good quality at this size. but keep downloading and i'll try to do my best!
